tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_name VARCHAR(255),
    victim_age INT,
    violation_type VARCHAR(255),
    perpetrator_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE victims (
  victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(255),
  victim_gender VARCHAR(10),
  victim_age INT,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE perpetrators (
  perpetrator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  perpetrator_name VARCHAR(255),
  perpetrator_gender VARCHAR(10),
  perpetrator_age INT,
  relationship_to_victim VARCHAR(50),
  violation_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Victims (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  nationality VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Perpetrators (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  organization VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Violations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_id INT,
  perpetrator_id INT,
  date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE victims (
  victim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(255),
  victim_age INT,
  victim_gender VARCHAR(10),
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE perpetrators (
  perpetrator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  perpetrator_name VARCHAR(255),
  perpetrator_age INT,
  perpetrator_gender VARCHAR(10),
  relationship_to_victim VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  violation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  violation_description TEXT,
  violation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  longitude DECIMAL(10, 6)
)

CREATE TABLE victims (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  occupation VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE perpetrators (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  affiliation VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE victims_violations (
  victim_id INT,
  violation_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE perpetrators_violations (
  perpetrator_id INT,
  violation_id INT
)
